reviews.review_text: Kokurase, a free 'Visual Novel in RPGmaker'. I liked it, I thought it had pretty neat Art, and the gameplay is decent. Really that's all you can ask. More content will be released as paid DLC in the coming months according to the Devs. I would recommend anyone who likes VN or RPGmaker games try Kokurase.
